content: you choose start the following toe decreases once you have reached this marker round 1 *k1 ssk knit to 3 stitches before marker k2tog k1 repeat once more from * round 2 k repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have 20 stitches in total use kitchener stitch to bind the edge of the toe and weave in ends if you have any problems feel free to contact me by email on crafthousemagic@gmail com visit my website crafthousemagic co uk for more patterns knitting project bags knitting accessories and hand dyed yarn
